name: Farm Wars
description:
An entry to Mini Game Jam 11 -Harvest-

A tile-based game where you try to kill the turrets before they shoot you.

  • Spacebar to shoot, 
  • Arrows to move

Made by SRJC Computer Science Club members: Oran C, Ari E, Zach H, and Chase M.

Link to playable game: https://srjc-computer-science-club.github.io/farmwars/
